Plot: A young dentist (Ormond) working in a British prison starts to become attracted to a violent inmate (Roth) after the break-up of her marriage, and embarks upon an illicit affair with him.
Reception: The movie received a mixed response.[2]The movie debuted at No.6.[3]
Production: The film was a BBC Films co-production with Distant Horizon & Miramax Films.[1]
